patterns: What is Hepatitis E
I might have Hepatitis E
I am suffering from Hepatitis E
I am having Hepatitis E
responses: A rare form of liver inflammation caused by infection with the hepatitis E virus (HEV). It is transmitted via food or drink handled by an infected person or through infected water supplies in areas where fecal matter may get into the water. Hepatitis E does not cause chronic liver disease.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Hepatitis E
Tell me the symptoms of Hepatitis E
Can you tell me the symptoms of Hepatitis E
responses: The main symptoms of Hepatitis E are: joint pain, vomiting, fatigue, high fever, yellowish skin, dark urine, nausea, loss of appetite, abdominal pain, yellowing of eyes, acute liver failure, coma, stomach bleeding.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Hepatitis E
What should i do to prevent Hepatitis E
How to save myself from Hepatitis E
Cure for Hepatitis E
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: stop alcohol consumption, rest, consult doctor, medication.

patterns: What is Dengue
I might have Dengue
I am suffering from Dengue
I am having Dengue
responses: an acute infectious disease caused by a flavivirus (species Dengue virus of the genus Flavivirus), transmitted by aedes mosquitoes, and characterized by headache, severe joint pain, and a rash. — called also breakbone fever, dengue fever.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Dengue
Tell me the symptoms of Dengue
Can you tell me the symptoms of Dengue
responses: The main symptoms of Dengue are: skin rash, chills, joint pain, vomiting,  fatigue,  high fever,  headache, nausea, loss of appetite, pain behind the eyes, back pain, malaise, muscle pain, red spots over body.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Dengue
What should i do to prevent Dengue
How to save myself from Dengue
Cure for Dengue
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: drink papaya leaf juice, avoid fatty spicy food, keep mosquitos away, keep hydrated.

patterns: What is Hepatitis D
I might have Hepatitis D
I am suffering from Hepatitis D
I am having Hepatitis D
responses: Hepatitis D, also known as the hepatitis delta virus, is an infection that causes the liver to become inflamed. This swelling can impair liver function and cause long-term liver problems, including liver scarring and cancer. The condition is caused by the hepatitis D virus (HDV).

Tell me the symptoms of Hepatitis D
Can you tell me the symptoms of Hepatitis D
responses: The main symptoms of Hepatitis D are:  joint pain, vomiting, fatigue, yellowish skin, dark urine, nausea, loss of appetite, abdominal pain, yellowing of eyes.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Hepatitis D
What should i do to prevent Hepatitis D
How to save myself from Hepatitis D
Cure for Hepatitis D
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: consult doctor, medication, eat healthy, follow up.

patterns: What is Heart attack
I might have Heart attack
I am suffering from Heart attack
I am having Heart attack
responses: The death of heart muscle due to the loss of blood supply. The loss of blood supply is usually caused by a complete blockage of a coronary artery, one of the arteries that supplies blood to the heart muscle.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Heart attack
Tell me the symptoms of Heart attack
Can you tell me the symptoms of Heart attack
responses: The main symptoms of Heart attack are:  vomiting, breathlessness, sweating, chest pain.

What should i do to prevent Heart attack
How to save myself from Heart attack
Cure for Heart attack
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are:call ambulance, chew or swallow asprin, keep calm.

patterns: What is Pneumonia
I might have Pneumonia
I am suffering from Pneumonia
I am having Pneumonia
responses: Pneumonia is an infection in one or both lungs. Bacteria, viruses, and fungi cause it. The infection causes inflammation in the air sacs in your lungs, which are called alveoli. The alveoli fill with fluid or pus, making it difficult to breathe.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Pneumonia
Tell me the symptoms of Pneumonia
Can you tell me the symptoms of Pneumonia
responses: The main symptoms of Pneumonia are: chills, fatigue, cough, high fever, breathlessness, sweating, malaise, phlegm, chest pain, fast heart rate, rusty sputum.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Pneumonia
What should i do to prevent Pneumonia
How to save myself from Pneumonia
Cure for Pneumonia
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: consult doctor, medication, rest, follow up.

patterns: What is Arthritis
I might have Arthritis
I am suffering from Arthritis
I am having Arthritis
responses: Arthritis is the swelling and tenderness of one or more of your joints. The main symptoms of arthritis are joint pain and stiffness, which typically worsen with age. The most common types of arthritis are osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Arthritis
Tell me the symptoms of Arthritis
Can you tell me the symptoms of Arthritis
responses: The main symptoms of Arthritis are: muscle weakness, stiff neck, swelling joints, movement stiffness, painful walking .

patterns: What are the precautions for the Arthritis
What should i do to prevent Arthritis
How to save myself from Arthritis
Cure for Arthritis
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: exercise, use hot and cold therapy, try acupuncture, massage .

patterns: What is Gastroenteritis
I might have Gastroenteritis
I am suffering from Gastroenteritis
I am having Gastroenteritis
responses: Gastroenteritis is an inflammation of the digestive tract, particularly the stomach, and large and small intestines. Viral and bacterial gastroenteritis are intestinal infections associated with symptoms of diarrhea , abdominal cramps, nausea , and vomiting .

patterns: What are the symptoms for Gastroenteritis
Tell me the symptoms of Gastroenteritis
Can you tell me the symptoms of Gastroenteritis
responses: The main symptoms of Gastroenteritis are: vomiting, sunken eyes, dehydration, diarrhoea.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Gastroenteritis
What should i do to prevent Gastroenteritis
How to save myself from Gastroenteritis
Cure for Gastroenteritis
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: stop eating solid food for while, try taking small sips of water, rest, ease back into eating .

patterns: What is Tuberculosis
I might have Tuberculosis
I am suffering from Tuberculosis
I am having Tuberculosis
responses: Tuberculosis (TB) is an infectious disease usually caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis (MTB) bacteria. Tuberculosis generally affects the lungs, but can also affect other parts of the body. Most infections show no symptoms, in which case it is known as latent tuberculosis.

patterns: What are the symptoms for Tuberculosis
Tell me the symptoms of Tuberculosis
Can you tell me the symptoms of Tuberculosis
responses: The main symptoms of Tuberculosis are: chills, vomiting, fatigue, weight loss, cough, high fever, breathlessness, sweating, loss of appetite, mild fever, yellowing of eyes, swelled lymph nodes, malaise, phlegm, chest pain, blood in sputum.

patterns: What are the precautions for the Tuberculosis
What should i do to prevent Tuberculosis
How to save myself from Tuberculosis
Cure for Tuberculosis
responses: Some of the common precautions you can take are: cover mouth, consult doctor, medication, rest.
